LabelText: Describe evidence of credential stuffing (many accounts, few attempts per account, shared IPs)
Identify affected applications or portals targeted by the attack
Block or throttle traffic from known malicious IPs, ASNs, or countries involved
Review logs for successful logins from suspicious IPs and user agents
Trigger password resets and session invalidation for accounts with suspicious access
Confirm MFA is enforced or enabled for impacted applications
Implement or tune bot detection, CAPTCHA, or risk-based authentication
Document the scale of the attack, accounts impacted, and mitigations implemented
